UI_visible_response: To circumvent the Great Firewall of China, one of the most common and effective methods is using a virtual private network (VPN). A VPN encrypts your internet traffic and routes it through a server in another country, thereby bypassing censorship measures6. Additionally, an easier approach could be to use a browser with a built-in VPN, such as Opera, which changes your real IP address to a virtual one, allowing you to bypass the Great Firewall more conveniently2. These methods are widely recognized for their ability to provide access to blocked content by masking your actual location and identity online.
traffic_visible_response: To circumvent the Great Firewall of China, one of the most common and effective methods is using a virtual private network (VPN). A VPN encrypts your internet traffic and routes it through a server in another country, thereby bypassing censorship measures [[6]]. Additionally, an easier approach could be to use a browser with a built-in VPN, such as Opera, which changes your real IP address to a virtual one, allowing you to bypass the Great Firewall more conveniently [[2]]. These methods are widely recognized for their ability to provide access to blocked content by masking your actual location and identity online.
